attributes.action: Ask the FA to explain how it chose teams for the revamped womens football league
attributes.background:
The FA is revamping women's football with WSL and Championship and teams had to apply for their spot.
Manchester Utd was awarded a place, despite not having a women's team for 13 years, ahead of teams that have worked their way up the leagues. 
On the face of it, it's making a mockery of the game.

rejection.details:
This is the responsibility of the FA, not the UK Government or Parliament. 

You can contact the FA here:

http://www.thefa.com/about-football-association/contact-us
